fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: EU Financial services legislation and initiatives, including: (1) Capital Markets Union; (2) cross-border distribution of funds; (3) personal pension; (4) retail financial products market; (5) sustainable finance; (6) public country by country reporting; (7) revised prudential framework for investment firms; (8) FinTech;  (9) European Market Infrastructure Regulation, including Euroclearing; and (10) review of the European Supervisory Authorities.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Corporate Bond Market Liquidity#E03429#MALLOY Paul M.#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3429#Member#B#Finance#Demand side
membership: Trade association memberships include: (1) Investment Association (http://www.theinvestmentassociation.org/); (2) European Fund and Asset Management Association (http://www.efama.org/SitePages/Home.aspx); (3) Investment Company Institute (http://www.ici.org/); (4) Irish Funds (http://www.irishfunds.ie/); and (5) Tax Incentivised Savings Association (http://www.tisa.uk.com/)
goals__remit: Vanguard's core purpose: To take a stand for all investors, to treat them fairly, and to give them the best chance for investment success.
